description: Number of 2-colored connected labeled graphs with n vertices of the first color and n vertices of the second color.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: F. Harary and R. W. Robinson, Labeled bipartite blocks, Canad. J. Math., 31 (1979), 60-68.
formula: a(n) = c(n,n) where c(0,1) = 1, c(0,m) = 0, c(n,m) = 2^(n*m) - Sum_{1 <= k <= n, 0 <= j <= m, k < n or j < m} C(n-1, k-1) * C(m, j) * 2^((n-k)*(m-j)) * c(k, j). - _Sean A. Irvine_, May 11 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More precise definition by _Pavel Irzhavski_, Jul 09 2013
More terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, May 11 2016
